📌 Example: `Release 1.3: Enhanced Voter Authentication`

## 🛠 How to Use
1. [ ] Ensure the election is configured in **New Election**.
2. [ ] Share the generated election link with voters.
3. [ ] Monitor results in the **Elections Dashboard**.
